derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French senat, from Latin senatus, from senex 'old man'

entry.tran: (美国、澳大利亚等国议会的)参议院
entry.def: The Senate is the smaller and more important of the two parts of the parliament in some countries, for example the United States and Australia.

example.ex: The Senate is expected to pass the bill shortly.
example.tran: 预计参议院不久就会通过此议案。

entry.tran: （某些大学的）大学理事会，大学评议会
entry.def: Senate or the Senate is the governing council at some universities.

example.ex: By the time I was Vice Chancellor, Senate had become a much larger and a much more democratic body...
example.tran: 到了我当校长的时候，大学评议会的人员规模已显著扩大，也变得更加民主了。

example.ex: The new bill would remove student representation from the university Senate.
example.tran: 新议案将取消大学评议会中的学生代表。

means.word_mean: 参议院（美国、法国、澳大利亚等国家的两个立法机构之一）；上院

sentences.en: The proposal was approved by both the House and the Senate.
sentences.cn: 那项提案在众议院和参议院均获通过。

jushi.english: The proposal was approved by both the House and the Senate.
jushi.chinese: 那项提案在众议院和参议院均获通过。
